personas.name: Helen

background_context.situation: Recently moved to Santa Barbara from Boston
background_context.constraints: Navigating a new city, finding community resources

goals_motivations.drives: Building a community and making new friends

behaviors_patterns.habits: Uses the club's website to stay informed

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Difficulty finding event times on the website
pain_points_frustrations.frustrations: Website navigation and visibility of new events

needs_desires.improvements: Clearer presentation of event times and new features

quotes: I'm very happy to have it every event that we've been to has been absolutely fabulous.
It might be nice to have the time reflected easily.

personas.name: Linda

background_context.situation: Moved to Santa Barbara for family reasons
background_context.constraints: Technical challenges with event management tools

goals_motivations.drives: Contributing to the community and organizing events

behaviors_patterns.work_style: Engaged in community organization and planning

pain_points_frustrations.frustrations: Inefficiency in managing waitlists and refunds

needs_desires.improvements: Easier event registration and refund processes

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes in the importance of community support

technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Moderate user but has encountered difficulties

quotes: If I've never done a jot form...she had a lot of trouble with it.
It would be nice to have the address in that reminder.

personas.name: Valerie

background_context.situation: Returned to Santa Barbara from the East Coast
background_context.environment: Familiar but needs to reintegrate into the community
background_context.constraints: Balancing work commitments with community activities

goals_motivations.drives: Reestablishing connections and engaging in local culture
goals_motivations.achievements: Finding events that fit into a busy schedule

behaviors_patterns.habits: Checks email and app for updates

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Difficulty navigating the app and calendar
pain_points_frustrations.frustrations: Overwhelmed by emails related to events

needs_desires.improvements: More clarity in event scheduling and notifications
needs_desires.desires: Events scheduled at more convenient times

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Values community but struggles with time management

quotes: It's frustrating when you're trying to sign up to something.
It would be nice to have the address in that reminder.
